Package com.cafean.jobstream.server.components

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cafean.jobstream.server.components.Task
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    public class Task
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    An encapsulation of a single wrapped application execution and task definition. Instances of this class are read from the Stream Definition by the Stream Manager and used as in-memory lookups and handles to these tasks.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int IDENT_MULTIPLIER
      The multiplier used to generate task ID numbers from step component numbers.
      static java.lang.String TASKDEF_EXTENSION
      the file extension used by task definition files

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Task()
      Creates a new empty task with no parent job stream.
      Task​(Stream parent)
      Creates a new empty task as part of the given job stream.

    • Field Detail

      • IDENT_MULTIPLIER

        public static final int IDENT_MULTIPLIER
        The multiplier used to generate task ID numbers from step component numbers. This number also determines the maximum number of tasks that can be generated for a single job step (IDENT_MULTIPLIER-1).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TASKDEF_EXTENSION

        public static final java.lang.String TASKDEF_EXTENSION
        the file extension used by task definition files
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • setKeywordValue

        public boolean setKeywordValue​(java.lang.String name,
                               java.lang.String value)
        Assigns the given value to the keyword with the given name. If no keyword with the given name is currently set then no change will be made.
        Parameters:
        name - a String containing the name of the keyword
        value - a String containing the new value of the keyword
        Returns:
        true if the keyword value is assigned; false otherwise

      • setInheritedKeywordValue

        public boolean setInheritedKeywordValue​(java.lang.String name,
                                        java.lang.String value)
        Sets an inherited keyword on this task with the given name and the given value. If a non-inherited keyword with the given name already exists then no keyword change will be made.
        Parameters:
        name - a String containing the name of the keyword
        value - a String containing the new value of the keyword
        Returns:
        true if the keyword value is assigned; false otherwise

      • setAutomaticKeywordValue

        public boolean setAutomaticKeywordValue​(java.lang.String name,
                                        java.lang.String value)
        Sets an automatic keyword on this task with the given name and the given value. If a keyword with the given name already exists then the existing keyword will be discarded.
        Parameters:
        name - a String containing the name of the keyword
        value - a String containing the new value of the keyword
        Returns:
        true if the keyword value is assigned; false otherwise

      • setCustomKeywordValue

        public boolean setCustomKeywordValue​(java.lang.String name,
                                     java.lang.String value)
        Sets an Custom keyword on this task with the given name and the given value. If a keyword with the given name already exists then the existing keyword will be discarded.
        Parameters:
        name - a String containing the name of the keyword
        value - a String containing the new value of the keyword
        Returns:
        true if the keyword value is assigned; false otherwise

      • setParametricKeywordValue

        public boolean setParametricKeywordValue​(java.lang.String name,
                                         java.lang.String value)
        Sets a Parametric keyword on this task with the given name and the given value. If a keyword with the given name already exists then the existing keyword will be discarded.
        Parameters:
        name - a String containing the name of the keyword
        value - a String containing the new value of the keyword
        Returns:
        true if the keyword value is assigned; false otherwise

      • getApplication

        public ApplicationDefinition getApplication()
        Returns the application definition that this task will use during execution.

        Note: The application definition is used when Task objects are included in task definitions. The application name is used in stream definitions where the stream includes a global list of the applications used in the stream.

      • getPythonApplication

        public ApplicationDefinition getPythonApplication()
        Returns the application definition that will be used to execute this the Python script(s) that will be run before or after this task.

        Note: The python application definition is used ONLY when Task objects are included in task definitions.

      • getPyPostApplication

        public ApplicationDefinition getPyPostApplication()
        Returns the PyPost application definition that will be used when executing Python script(s) that will be run before or after this task.

        Note: The pypost application definition is used ONLY when Task objects are included in task definitions.

      • getStreamStagingLocation

        public java.lang.String getStreamStagingLocation()
        Returns the staging location for this task's stream, local or remote. This location is the stream's relative location and name appended to the staging location defined for the target platform.
        Returns:
        a String containing the location
        See Also:
        PlatformProperties.getStagingLocation(), Stream.getLocation(), Stream.getName()

      • getLogLevel

        public java.lang.String getLogLevel()
        Gets the logging level requested for this task. Available logging levels are the following case insensitive strings: CRITICAL, WARNING, INFO, and DEBUG.

      • setLogLevel

        public void setLogLevel​(java.lang.String logLevel)
        Sets the logging level requested for this task. Available logging levels are the following case insensitive strings: CRITICAL, WARNING, INFO, and DEBUG.

      • getTrackerDBID

        public long getTrackerDBID()

      • setTrackerDBID

        public void setTrackerDBID​(long trackerDBID)
        Sets the DBID assigned to this task by the tracking server module.

      • getAnimationModel

        public java.lang.String getAnimationModel()
        Returns the location of the animation mask selected to animate this task. This is the location on the client (i.e. submitter) that will be used as a hint later to determine which mask to open.

      • setAnimationModel

        public void setAnimationModel​(java.lang.String animationModel)
        Sets the location of the animation mask selected to animate this task. This is the location on the client (i.e. submitter) that will be used as a hint later to determine which mask to open.

        Returns:
        the customProcessing

      • getCustomProcessing

        public CustomProcessing getCustomProcessing​(java.lang.String phase)
        Returns the custom processing command set for the given phase.
        Parameters:
        phase - a String containing one of the custom processing command phases: CustomProcessing.PROC_SETUP, CustomProcessing.PROC_PRE_EXEC, CustomProcessing.PROC_POST_EXEC, CustomProcessing.PROC_CLEANUP,
